text:
Hi Paul apologies for taking a while to get back to you. 

I’m currently working at Sky as part of a Sky Drama placement aimed at getting disabled people into the media industry. So far I’ve done some post production work where I spent time with graders, sound mixers and a series of editors. I did actually spend the day at DNEG getting some insight into VFX so I have some idea of what happens in that part of the process.

I’m currently just trying to figure out where exactly I fit in the industry and I guess with disabled access being one of my biggest hurdles it’s difficult to gauge how and where to start.
